content: Retrieve three famous quotes related to hope

Certainly! Here are three famous quotes related to hope:

1. "Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness." – Desmond Tutu

2. "The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance." – Alan Watts

3. "We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope." – Martin Luther King Jr.

These quotes emphasize the importance of maintaining hope even in challenging times.
